attributes.action: Implement tests for Second Life (Chat Site)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Second Life has had a positive outcome for industries concerning profit. However, it can be seen that the social damage far outweighs the economic gain of private companies.

An independent and/or governmental investigation should be performed to measure the social damage caused by Second Life (e.g. divorce, child neglect, etc.)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
